question: You want to hold a surprise party for a friend who is visiting his hometown after a long time from a foreign country. Write a letter to a common friend asking for his help in organizing the party and in your letter:Write the reasons for organizing the partyDescribe when, where and how you would be organizing the partyAsk your friend to meet you in person for further discussions
text: Hope you are fine. With immense pleasure I am writing this letter to inform you that our best friend Mark is coming back to India.
Mark recently has graduated from University of Canada with distinction grades, and he will be visiting India almost after 4 years. So, I would like to throw a surprise party for his welcome.

I have some great ideas related to this celebration in mind. In my opinion, his house will be the best place to conduct this party on the same day of his arrival. Firstly, we will seek permission from his family members to set up the party at their home.
To make this part unforgettable and amazing, we need to buy some specific party related items, such as balloons, some fancy lights that create special effects, decoration stuff and food as well.

For all this preparation, I would like to invite you to come and meet me at my place and then after having some snacks, we both will go to Mark’s home to discuss about our ideas, party setup and if you have some better suggestions then we will talk in person.
I hope, we together will make it the best party ever for him.

error_list.error_des: It appears that you are missing a comma after the introductory phrase With immense pleasure. Consider adding a comma.
Your article usage with the geographic name University of Canada may be incorrect.
It seems that preposition use may be incorrect here.
The preposition about seems unecessary after the verb discuss. Consider removing the preposition.
